evidence.claim: HumanCare utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing solutions.
They offer APIs that comply with FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, ensuring the privacy and security of patient data.
HumanCare employs Azure for cloud hosting and data processing.
EDI transactions conforming to X12 formats are supported within their infrastructure.

icp.icp_reason: Company focuses on health data exchange with cloud-based solutions using APIs, likely handling X12 transactions.
